data.name: 东方帝国之丝绸之路 Demo
data.detailed_description:
welcome to the different world journey of the Silk Road of the eastern empire!

  • in this tower defense game with distinctive stylized art and excellent level design, you will experience the fantastic ancient adventure stories along the Silk Road and start an epic journey!
  • in the mysterious ancient oriental country, the New Dynasty unified the Central Plains after the period of separation of the vassal states. In order to revive the reputation of the dynasty, the emperor sent envoys to restart the Silk Road, all of which are strengthening the connection with countries around the world.

game features:

  • distinctive stylized Art
  • characteristic buildings built according to historical facts
  • diverse enemies
  • multiple protagonists to choose from
  • a large number of historical and cultural achievements
  • lots of spells and skills to learn
  • recruit exclusive characters with regional characteristics
  • a guidebook for recording anecdotes

data.short_description: Experience the perfect combination of tower defense and the historical plot of the Silk Road, so as to bring an amazing epic game adventure experience! You will follow our protagonists in a strategic battle on the Eurasian continent! Come on, buddy, this epic fantasy adventure needs your help!

fullgame.name: The Silk Road of the eastern Dynasty

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual Core i5 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 x64
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
